properties.areaDesc: Monroe, IN; Greene, IN; Owen, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 19 at 9:36AM EST until January 22 at 10:25AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a Flood
Warning for a portion of the following waterway in central Indiana...

White River...

.Lowland flooding will develop at Spencer on the White River
this afternoon and likely last until Tuesday night.  The river
is expected to crest about one foot above flood stage Monday
evening.  This flooding is a result of recent precipitation.

The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the White River at Spencer.
* from this afternoon to Wednesday morning.
* At 8:30 AM Sunday the stage was 13.1 feet.
* Flood stage is 14.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* At 16.0 feet...Flood water affects gravel pit.  High water concerns
farmers in agricultural season about crops and livestock.  Lowest
portions of Trails 1 and 7 in McCormicks Creek Park flood.
properties.instruction:
Precautionary/Preparedness Actions...

Motorists should never drive into flood water. Turn around and go
another way. Keep children away from flooded areas. Recreational and
agricultural interests should remain alert to changing river
conditions.

For detailed flood information go to weather.gov/ind on the web and
click on rivers and lakes.
